overview: For young, Catholic men, nothing is more important than making Father happy. for a gay priest, there's nothing finer than hearing his boys say, "Yes, Father." Given how submissive these altar boys are in Yes Father Vol. 4: Benediction It's no surprise the older men often take advantage of their trust. This religious series features all the dirty secrets the Church doesn't want you to see...
title: Yes Father 4: Benediction
